definitions.definition: To become separated out into distinct layers or strata .
examples: Even without a pronounced social class system, people in a large society tend to stratify .

definitions.definition: To separate out into distinct layers or strata .
examples: In this cut you can see how the sedimentary rock layers have been clearly stratified .

main_definition: ( intransitive ) To become separated out into distinct layers or strata .
secondary_definitions: ( transitive ) To separate out into distinct layers or strata .
